game.name: Spookynakki
game.desc: Spookynakki is the bone-chilling continuation of Grabanakki, featuring 3 new worlds, a variety of new and returning mechanics, and a completely new OST. Clear level after level of monsters, using the very blocks you stand on as your only weapon. Can you defeat every foe without falling through the shrinking foundation? Don't wait anymore and go clear the 24 spooky stages of block-throwing combat!
